          <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
           var map;
     var bingcredentials = 'EcY2oKDl7MV1X3AaMpAL~wDTRz_Bjb72zipuUTcxPHg~AqNjsmnSt6sotfK72pznSTe3X-kk3TY9XFbEGmuhFbs24aP6ittltzEmxwWdpsNS';
     var mapCenterLatitude = '52.52810000000';
     var mapCenterLongitude = '13.39129000000';
     var mapZoomLevel = '14';
 
     // Initialize the Map instance
     function InitializeMap() {
         try {
 
             Microsoft.Maps.loadModule('Microsoft.Maps.Overlays.Style',
         {
             callback: function () {
                 map = new Microsoft.Maps.Map(document.getElementById("bingMapPlaceHolder"),
                 {
                     credentials: bingcredentials,
                     mapTypeId: Microsoft.Maps.MapTypeId.road,
                     enableSearchLogo: false,
                     showCopyright: false,
                     showLogo: false,
                     showDashboard: true,
                     customizeOverlays: true,
                     center: new Microsoft.Maps.Location(eval(mapCenterLatitude), eval(mapCenterLongitude)),
                     zoom: eval(mapZoomLevel)
                 });
 
                 map.entities.clear();
                 //var pin = new Microsoft.Maps.Pushpin(map.getCenter(), null);
                 //map.entities.push(pin);
 
                 dataLayer = new Microsoft.Maps.EntityCollection();
                 map.entities.push(dataLayer);
 
                 var infoboxLayer = new Microsoft.Maps.EntityCollection();
                 map.entities.push(infoboxLayer);
 
                 infobox = new Microsoft.Maps.Infobox(new Microsoft.Maps.Location(0, 0), { visible: false, offset: new Microsoft.Maps.Point(0, 20) });
                 infoboxLayer.push(infobox);
 
                 AddData();
             }
         });
         } catch (e) {
             alert(e);
         }
     }
 
 
     function AddData() {
         var imgWidth, imgHeight;
         var image = new Image();
         image.src = "/images/map.jpg";
         imgWidth = image.width;
         imgHeight = image.height;
 
         //var pin1 = new Microsoft.Maps.Pushpin(map.getCenter(), null);
         var pin1 = new Microsoft.Maps.Pushpin(map.getCenter(), { icon: '/images/map.jpg', width: imgWidth, height: imgHeight, draggable: false });
         pin1.Title = 'Hotel Adelante Berlin-Mitte';
         pin1.Description = 'Borsigstraï¿½e 1, 10115 Berlin';
         Microsoft.Maps.Events.addHandler(pin1, 'click', displayInfobox);
         dataLayer.push(pin1);
 
         $.ajax({
             type: "POST",
             url: "Page.aspx/GetLocationItemList",
             data: "",
             contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
             dataType: "json",
             success: function (data) {
                 //alert(data.d);
                 $.each(data.d, function (index, LocationItem) {
                     var pin2 = new Microsoft.Maps.Pushpin(new Microsoft.Maps.Location(LocationItem.latitude, LocationItem.longitude));
                     pin2.Title = LocationItem.title;
                     pin2.Description = LocationItem.description;
                     Microsoft.Maps.Events.addHandler(pin2, 'click', displayInfobox);
                     dataLayer.push(pin2);
                 });
             },
 
             failure: function(msg) {
                 alert("Error");
             }
 
         });
 
 
         //var pin2 = new Microsoft.Maps.Pushpin(new Microsoft.Maps.Location(0, -30));
         //pin2.Title = "This is Pin 2";
         //pin2.Description = "Pin 2 description";
         //Microsoft.Maps.Events.addHandler(pin2, 'click', displayInfobox);
         //dataLayer.push(pin2);
     }
 
     function displayInfobox(e) {
         if (e.targetType == 'pushpin') {
             infobox.setLocation(e.target.getLocation());
             infobox.setOptions({ visible: true, title: e.target.Title, description: e.target.Description });
         }
     }
 
 
 
 
     $(window).load(function () {
         InitializeMap();
     });
          </script>
